metadata.title: CVE-2024-46865 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fou: fix initialization of grcThe grc must be initialize first. There can be a condition where iffou is NULL, goto out will be executed and grc would be useduninitialized.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-46865` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.11.0-8-generic - 6.11.0-8.8
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-8-generic - 6.11.0-8.8
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-8-generic-64k - 6.11.0-8.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1004-aws - 6.11.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1004-azure - 6.11.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1002-gcp - 6.11.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1004-lowlatency - 6.11.0-1004.4
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1004-lowlatency-64k - 6.11.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1006-oracle - 6.11.0-1006.6
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1006-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.11.0-1004-raspi - 6.11.0-1004.4
No subscription required
